request.cookies.description: A dictionary of cookie names mapped to cookie values.

request.domain.description: The domain used to access this page.

request.full_url.description: The URL used to access this page, with the query string.

request.path.description: The path component of the URL.

request.path_and_query.description: The path and query component of the URL.

request.query.description: The query string component of the URL.

request.query_dict.description: The query string coverted into a name->value dictionary.

request.referrer.description: The HTTP referrer, the url of the page that linked to the current page.

request.remote_ip.description: The IP address of the visitor.

request.scheme.description: The protocol of the request (either http or https).

request.search_engine.description: The search engine used to find this page, if applicable. Ex: google, aol, live, yahoo, images.google, etc.

request.search_keyword.description: The keyword phrase used to find this page, if applicable.

request.headers.description: A dictionary of available request headers.
